ingredients: 1 (8 ounce) package cream cheese, softened,   +   1/2 cup confectioners' sugar,   +   1/2 teaspoon vanilla extract, 1 pint fresh strawberries, hulled and cored, 3  graham crackers, crushed, or as needed
